ProjectData.name: The Bastion
ProjectData.description: The Bastion is a server for the Republic guilds of the Harbinger server in Star Wars: The Old Republic. We are a community of guilds and players that have been playing together since the game launched in 2011.

ProjectData.name: Terraza
ProjectData.description: Terraza embodies the art of outdoor living. Our homes feature stunning terraces, where you can bask in the beauty of nature and enjoy the open sky from the comfort of your own abode. It consists of units of 4-bedroom semidetached Duplexes and 4 units of 4-bedroom terrace duplexes
